biotools.summary: The Biosynthetic Gene cluster Meta’omics abundance Profiler (BiG-MAP). A command-line tool that it is able to profile the abundance and expression of a collection of gene clusters across metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data from any kind of biome, including human, plant, animal, marine, and soil microbiomes.
